item.title: European Central Bank warns rising trade tensions increased risks to financial stability
item.description: The Financial Stability Review also said weak growth was now a bigger threat to the 20-nation euro zone than high inflation.

item.title: Target shares plunge 20% after discounter cuts forecast, posts biggest earnings miss in two years
item.description: Target missed on earnings and revenue even as it cut prices on thousands of items, including milk, diapers and toys, to try to attract discerning shop...

item.title: Delta forecasts more sales growth in 2025 thanks to high-end demand, 'resilient economy'
item.description: Delta, the most profitable U.S. airline, expects to expand capacity by no more than 4% year-over-year in 2025.

item.title: European markets trade higher as traders assess simmering geopolitical tensions
item.description: European markets traded higher early Wednesday as investors keep an eye on a spike in tensions in the Ukraine-Russia war.

item.title: Doubts mount over Britain’s ambitious growth plans — with warnings of further tax rises possible
